#summary Example code

= Examples =

Below is an example of how to setup a sample client:

{{{
class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {
            MinecraftClient mc = new MinecraftClient("TestUser", "", new IPEndPoint(IPAddress.Parse("127.0.0.1"), 25565));
            Console.WriteLine("Connecting...");
            mc.ConnectedToServer += new MinecraftClient.MinecraftClientEventHandler(mc_ConnectedToServer);
            mc.DisconnectedFromServer += new MinecraftClient.MinecraftClientEventHandler(mc_DisconnectedFromServer);
            mc.Connect();

            Console.ReadLine();
            Environment.Exit(0);
        }

        static void mc_DisconnectedFromServer(object sender, MinecraftClientConnectEventArgs args)
        {
            Console.WriteLine("Disconnected from server.");
        }

        static void mc_ConnectedToServer(object sender, MinecraftClientConnectEventArgs args)
        {
            Console.WriteLine("Connected to server.");
        }


    }
}}}
